Package app.factory

Class ComponentFactory

java.lang.Object
app.factory.ComponentFactory
public class ComponentFactory extends Object
A factory class for creating components within the sensor network system. This class provides static methods to create instances of Register, Client, and Sensor components, encapsulating the component creation complexity and providing a straightforward interface for system setup.

Each method in this class utilizes the AbstractComponent.createComponent(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object[]) method from BCM4Java framework, simplifying the instantiation of components by handling the necessary configuration and initialization details internally.

  • Constructor Details

      public ComponentFactory()

  • Method Details

    • createRegister

      public static String createRegister(String uriInboundPortNode, String uriInboundPortClient) throws Exception
      Creates a new Register component with specified inbound ports. This method initializes a Register component, which acts as a central registry for nodes and clients in the network, facilitating their interaction.
      Parameters:
      uriInboundPortNode - The URI for the inbound port to receive connections from nodes.
      uriInboundPortClient - The URI for the inbound port to receive connections from clients.
      Returns:
      The unique identifier of the created Register component.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error during the component creation process.

    • createClient

      public static String createClient(ClientConfig config) throws Exception
      Creates a new Client component based on the provided configuration. This method initializes a Client component configured to perform operations as specified in the ClientConfig. The Client is responsible for sending requests and handling responses within the sensor network.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration object containing setup data for the Client.
      Returns:
      The unique identifier of the created Client component.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error during the component creation process.

    • createSensor

      public static String createSensor(SensorConfig config) throws Exception
      Creates a new Sensor component based on the provided configuration. This method initializes a Sensor component, which represents a single sensor node in the network, capable of gathering and sending sensor data. It is configured according to the SensorConfig.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration object containing setup data for the Sensor.
      Returns:
      The unique identifier of the created Sensor component.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error during the component creation process.
